plugin.name: 🧩 Note Protector
plugin.description: Encrypt and decrypt notes with a token
plugin.author: aaronpoweruser
plugin.dFiles-NOTE: If you want to use HTML windows, remove the '-EDIT_ME' ABOVE

plugin.commands.name: Note Protector Lock Notes (npln)
plugin.commands.description: Encrypts notes with the given token

plugin.commands.name: Note Protector Unlock Notes (npun)
plugin.commands.description: Decrypts notes with the given token

plugin.commands.name: onMessageFromHTMLView
plugin.commands.description: aaronpoweruser.NoteProtector: Callback function to receive messages from HTML view

plugin.settings.COMMENT: This is for use by the editSettings helper function. PluginID must match the plugin.id in the top of this file

plugin.settings.title: To be be encypted token
plugin.settings.description: Enter some string and see it change when the plugin is run

plugin.settings.title: To be decyrpted token
plugin.settings.description: Enter some string and see it change when the plugin is run

plugin.settings.NOTE: DO NOT CHANGE THE FOLLOWING SETTINGS; ADD YOUR SETTINGS ABOVE ^^^

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Note Protector commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
